metadata.title: Surface Weather and Sea Surface Temperature from the North Pacific Ocean from 70-75N and 150-170W (1947-48)

creators.name: National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Environmental Satellite, Data

metadata.description:
Publication Title: Weather summaries for ocean area 70 [degrees]-75 [degrees] N, 150 [degrees]-170 [degrees] W (pub.1949). 

Typescript (carbon copy).

ASHEVILLE: 266.5; F-3-3-5 is written on the cover.

Includes surface data for percentage frequency of ceiling heights, sky cover, precipitation, obstruction to vision, and visibility; mean, maximum and minimum air temperature; mean sea water temperature, mean wind speed and prevailing wind direction. Station latitude and longitude are reported.  

Available from the NOAA Library System: URL http://www.lib.noaa.gov/.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.
